data.title: “It just couldn’t be denied”: Tom Hanks Couldn’t Stop Himself Resisting Rita Wilson Despite Being Married to His College Sweetheart for Nearly 10 Years
data.meta_description: Tom Hanks talked about his marriage life when he was married to Samantha Lewes and then falling in love with his current wife Rita Wilson!
data.text:
Tom Hanks is one of the notable and iconic actors in Hollywood that has had quite a successful married life over the decades. Being married to the love of his life Rita Wilson, the actor couldn’t seem any more happy when he is with her.

Advertisement

Before he married Rita Wilson, Tom Hanks was married to another woman for almost 10 years. Being married to Samantha Lewes, the two had their problems for a while and that is when he met Rita Wilson.

When Tom Hanks Fell Hard For Rita Wilson

The actor found love when he married Samantha Lewes in 1978. Being married for almost a decade, the two decided to divorce which was finalized in 1987. During their marriage, however, Tom Hanks admitted that he met Rita Wilson.

As per the actor, he first met Rita Wilson back in 1985 while he was still married to Samantha Lewes. Although they might be having a rough period, the Captain Phillips actor stated that he had an immediate attraction towards Rita Wilson. In an interview with GQ, the actor revealed that he just looked at Wilson and there was an instant connection between the two.

“Rita and I just looked at each other and — kaboing — that was that. I asked Rita if it was the real thing for her, and it just couldn’t be denied.”

He later divorced Samantha Lewes in 1987 and went on to marry Rita Wilson in 1988. Their marriage has been going strong ever since. In their interview, the duo talked about their strong marriage life and how they enhance it day by day.

Tom Hanks And Rita Wilson Talk About Their Strong Marriage

Related: “I think I was genetically inclined to get it”: Tom Hanks is Ready to Lose Hollywood Roles After His Close Encounter With Death in $429M Movie Reminded Him of His Mortality

In their interview, the married couple talked about their marriage that stayed the test of time. Stating that they went further with maturity, timing, willingness, and the compromises that both of them would have to make for each other.

Advertisement

“The success of our relationship was a matter of timing, maturity and our willingness to have an intimate connection. When I married Rita, I thought, ‘This is going to require some change on my part.’ I won’t deny that providence was part of us finding each other, but our relationship isn’t magic — the way it’s shown in movies.”

He further continued,

“In real life, our connection is as concrete as me sitting here. Not that marriage doesn’t come close to being hell in a handbasket sometimes. But we both know that no matter what, we’ll be with each other — and we’ll get through it.”

The two have been married since 1988 and have been going strong ever since. Tom Hanks is currently busy creating his upcoming movie titled Here. The movie is currently in the production stage of development and has quite an intriguing story to tell.

Source: People
